javax.swing.text.html

Class StyleSheet.LargeConversionSet

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.swing.text.SimpleAttributeSet
      • javax.swing.text.html.StyleSheet.LargeConversionSet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Cloneable, AttributeSet, MutableAttributeSet
    Enclosing class:
    StyleSheet

     class StyleSheet.LargeConversionSet
extends SimpleAttributeSet
    Large set of attributes that does conversion of requests for attributes of type StyleConstants.
